Detailed Description

Contains ray tracing routines optimized for different input/output formats.

Function Documentation

void prop ( thread_t *  data  ) 

A wrapper prop routine that handles all the different cases by calling the different routines.

Handles threading.

void prop_grid_grid ( const MAP_T *  mapin,
MAP_T *  mapout,
double  alpha,
double  displacex,
double  displacey,
double  scale,
int  wrap 
)

Propagate OPD defines on grid mapin to grid mapout.

alpha is the scaling of data. displacex, displacy is the displacement of the center of the beam on the input grid. scale is the cone effect. 

00165                                    {
00166     //A convenient function. Not optimized
00167     PTS_T pts;
00168     pts.nsa=1;
00169     pts.origx=&mapout->ox;
00170     pts.origy=&mapout->oy;
00171     pts.dx=mapout->dx;
00172     pts.nx=mapout->nx;
00173     prop_grid_pts(mapin, &pts, mapout->p, alpha, displacex, displacey,
00174           scale, wrap, 0,0,1);
00175 }

void prop_grid_pts ( const MAP_T *  mapin,
const PTS_T *  pts,
double *  phiout0,
double  alpha,
double  displacex,
double  displacey,
double  scale,
int  wrap,
long  sastart,
long  saend,
int  optim 
)

Propagate OPD defines on grid mapin to subapertures.

alpha is the scaling of data. displacex, displacy is the displacement of the center of the beam on the input grid. scale is the cone effect. 

00184                                                {
00185     /*
00186        2010-01-02: Improved by saving x interpolations for each
00187        subaperture during non-matched case. original function
00188        renamed to prop_grid_pts_old time cut by almost 3 fold for
00189        each LGS WFS.  0.40s->0.16s
00190      */
00191     int isa, ipix,jpix;
00192     int mx,my;
00193     int nplocx2;
00194     //const int optim = 0;//for debugging
00195     const int ninx   = mapin->nx;
00196     const int niny   = mapin->ny;
00197     const int nx     = pts->nx;
00198     const double dx_in1 = 1/mapin->dx;
00199     const double dxout  = pts->dx;
00200     const double dx_in2 = scale*dx_in1;
00201     displacex = (displacex-mapin->ox)*dx_in1;
00202     displacey = (displacey-mapin->oy)*dx_in1;
00203     if(!saend) saend=pts->nsa;
00204     if(optim && fabs(dx_in2*dxout-1)<EPS){
00205     double dplocx, dplocy;
00206     int nplocx, nplocy;
00207         for(isa=sastart; isa<saend; isa++){
00208         double (*phiout)[nx]=(double(*)[nx])(phiout0+nx*nx*isa);
00209         double (*phiin)[ninx]=(double(*)[ninx])(mapin->p);
00210         const double origx=pts->origx[isa];
00211         const double origy=pts->origy[isa];
00212         double w11,w10,w01,w00;
00213         
00214         dplocy = myfma(origy,dx_in2,displacey);
00215         dplocx = myfma(origx,dx_in2,displacex);
00216         SPLIT(dplocx,dplocx,nplocx);
00217         SPLIT(dplocy,dplocy,nplocy);
00218         if(!wrap){
00219         int sx, sy;
00220         if(nplocy<0){
00221             sy=-nplocy;
00222         }else
00223             sy=0;
00224         if(nplocx<0){
00225             sx=-nplocx;
00226         }else
00227             sx=0;
00228         
00229         my=niny-nplocy-1;//remaining possible points.
00230         if(my>nx){
00231             my=nx;
00232         }
00233         if(my<=sy){
00234             continue;
00235         }
00236         mx=ninx-nplocx-1;
00237         if(mx>nx){
00238             mx=nx;
00239         }
00240         if(mx<=sx){
00241             continue;
00242         }
00243 
00244         if((dplocx)<EPS && (dplocy)<EPS){
00245             /*aligned perfectly.*/
00246             for(jpix=sy; jpix<my; jpix++){
00247             //nplocy2=nplocy+jpix;
00248             double *restrict phiin2=phiin[nplocy+jpix];
00249             double *restrict phiout2=phiout[jpix];
00250             for(ipix=sx; ipix<mx; ipix++){
00251                 phiout2[ipix]+=alpha*phiin2[nplocx+ipix];
00252             }
00253             }
00254         }else{  
00255             w11=dplocx*dplocy;
00256             w10=(1.-dplocx)*dplocy;
00257             w01=dplocx*(1.-dplocy);
00258             w00=(1.-dplocx)*(1.-dplocy);    
00259             for(jpix=sy; jpix<my; jpix++){
00260             //nplocy2=nplocy+jpix;
00261             double *restrict phiin2=phiin[nplocy+jpix];
00262             double *restrict phiin3=phiin[nplocy+jpix+1];
00263             double *restrict phiout2=phiout[jpix];
00264             for(ipix=sx; ipix<mx; ipix++){
00265                 phiout2[ipix]+=
00266                 alpha*(+phiin2[nplocx+ipix]*w00
00267                        +phiin2[nplocx+ipix+1]*w01
00268                        +phiin3[nplocx+ipix]*w10
00269                        +phiin3[nplocx+ipix+1]*w11);
00270             }
00271             }
00272         }
00273         }else{//wraping
00274         double *phiin_1, *phiin_2;
00275 
00276         if(ninx < nx || niny < nx){
00277             error("Input map is too small. wraps more than once\n");
00278         }
00279         w11=dplocx*dplocy;
00280         w10=(1.-dplocx)*dplocy;
00281         w01=dplocx*(1.-dplocy);
00282         w00=(1.-dplocx)*(1.-dplocy);
00283 
00284         nplocy-=niny*(nplocy/niny);
00285         if(nplocy<0)
00286             nplocy+=niny;
00287         nplocx-=ninx*(nplocx/ninx);
00288         if(nplocx<0)
00289             nplocx+=ninx;
00290         my=niny-nplocy-1;//remaining possible points.
00291         mx=ninx-nplocx-1;
00292         if(my>nx) my=nx;
00293         if(mx>nx) mx=nx;
00294 
00295         for(jpix=0; jpix<nx; jpix++){
00296             if(jpix<my){
00297             phiin_1=phiin[nplocy];
00298             phiin_2=phiin[nplocy+1];
00299             }else if(jpix==my){
00300             phiin_1=phiin[nplocy];
00301             phiin_2=phiin[nplocy+1-niny];
00302             }else{
00303             phiin_1=phiin[nplocy-niny];
00304             phiin_2=phiin[nplocy+1-niny];
00305             }
00306             nplocx2=nplocx;
00307             for(ipix=0; ipix<mx; ipix++){
00308             phiout[jpix][ipix]+=alpha*
00309                 (phiin_1[nplocx2]*w00
00310                  +phiin_1[nplocx2+1]*w01
00311                  +phiin_2[nplocx2]*w10
00312                  +phiin_2[nplocx2+1]*w11);
00313             nplocx2++;
00314             }
00315             if(mx<nx){
00316             ipix=mx;
00317             phiout[jpix][ipix]+=alpha*
00318                 (phiin_1[nplocx2]*w00
00319                  +phiin_1[nplocx2+1-ninx]*w01
00320                  +phiin_2[nplocx2]*w10
00321                  +phiin_2[nplocx2+1-ninx]*w11);
00322             nplocx2++;
00323 
00324             nplocx2-=ninx;
00325             for(ipix=mx+1; ipix<nx; ipix++){
00326                 phiout[jpix][ipix]+=alpha*
00327                 (phiin_1[nplocx2]*w00
00328                  +phiin_1[nplocx2+1]*w01
00329                  +phiin_2[nplocx2]*w10
00330                  +phiin_2[nplocx2+1]*w11);
00331                 nplocx2++;
00332             }
00333             }
00334             nplocy++;
00335         }
00336         }       
00337     }
00338     }else{ /*different spacing. or non optim*/
00339     double dplocx, dplocy;
00340     double ratio;
00341     const double (*phiin)[ninx]=(const double(*)[ninx])(mapin->p);
00342     int nplocx, nplocy;
00343     ratio = dxout*dx_in2;
00344     for(isa=sastart; isa<saend; isa++){
00345         double (*phiout)[nx]=(double(*)[nx])(phiout0+nx*nx*isa);
00346         const double origx=pts->origx[isa];
00347         const double origy=pts->origy[isa];
00348         double dplocx0, dplocy0;
00349         dplocy0 = myfma(origy,dx_in2,displacey);
00350         dplocx0 = myfma(origx,dx_in2,displacex);
00351         if(!wrap){
00352         int sx, sy;
00353         if(dplocx0<0){
00354             sx=iceil(-dplocx0/ratio);
00355         }else
00356             sx=0;
00357         if(dplocy0<0){
00358             sy=iceil(-dplocy0/ratio);
00359         }else
00360             sy=0;
00361 
00362         my=iceil((niny-1-dplocy0)/ratio);
00363         if(my>nx){
00364             my=nx;
00365         }
00366         mx=iceil((ninx-1-dplocx0)/ratio);
00367         if(mx>nx){
00368             mx=nx;
00369         }
00370         
00371         int nplocxs[mx];
00372         double dplocxs[mx];
00373 
00374         dplocy0  = myfma(origy+(double)sy*dxout,dx_in2,displacey);
00375         dplocx0  = myfma(origx+(double)sx*dxout,dx_in2,displacex);
00376         
00377         for(ipix=sx; ipix<mx; ipix++){
00378             SPLIT(dplocx0,dplocx,nplocx);
00379             nplocxs[ipix]=nplocx;
00380             dplocxs[ipix]=dplocx;
00381             dplocx0+=ratio;
00382         }
00383 
00384         for(jpix = sy; jpix < my; jpix++){
00385             SPLIT(dplocy0,dplocy,nplocy);
00386             const double dplocy1=1.-dplocy;
00387             const double *phiin2=phiin[nplocy];
00388             const double *phiin3=phiin[nplocy+1];
00389             double *phiout2=phiout[jpix];
00390             for(ipix=sx; ipix<mx; ipix++){
00391             nplocx=nplocxs[ipix];
00392             dplocx=dplocxs[ipix];
00393             phiout2[ipix]+=alpha*
00394                 (+(phiin2[nplocx]
00395                    +(phiin2[nplocx+1]-phiin2[nplocx])*dplocx)
00396                  *dplocy1
00397                  +(phiin3[nplocx]
00398                    +(phiin3[nplocx+1]-phiin3[nplocx])*dplocx)
00399                  *dplocy);
00400             }
00401             dplocy0+=ratio;
00402         }
00403         }else{
00404         const double *phiin_1, *phiin_2;
00405         double dplocy1;
00406         int mx0;
00407         if(ninx < nx*ratio || niny < nx*ratio){
00408             info("nx=%d, ratio=%g, ninx=%d\n",nx,ratio,ninx);
00409             error("Input map is too small. wraps more than once\n");
00410         }
00411         dplocy0-=niny*ifloor(dplocy0/niny);
00412         dplocx0-=ninx*ifloor(dplocx0/ninx);
00413         mx0=iceil((ninx-1.-dplocx0)/ratio);
00414         if(mx0>nx) mx0=nx;
00415         if(mx0<0) mx0=0;
00416         
00417         int nplocxs[nx];
00418         int nplocxs2[nx];
00419         double dplocxs[nx];
00420         mx=mx0;
00421         for(ipix=0; ipix<mx; ipix++){
00422             SPLIT(dplocx0,dplocx,nplocx);
00423             nplocxs[ipix]=nplocx;
00424             nplocxs2[ipix]=nplocx+1;
00425             dplocxs[ipix]=dplocx;
00426             dplocx0+=ratio;
00427         }
00428         if(mx<nx){
00429             while(dplocx0<ninx && mx<nx){//falls on the edge
00430             SPLIT(dplocx0,dplocx,nplocx);
00431             nplocxs[mx]=nplocx;
00432             nplocxs2[mx]=0;
00433             dplocxs[mx]=dplocx;
00434             dplocx0+=ratio;
00435             mx++;
00436             }
00437             dplocx0-=ninx;
00438             for(ipix=mx; ipix<nx; ipix++){
00439             SPLIT(dplocx0,dplocx,nplocx);
00440             nplocxs[ipix]=nplocx;
00441             nplocxs2[ipix]=nplocx+1;
00442             dplocxs[ipix]=dplocx;
00443             dplocx0+=ratio;
00444             }
00445         }
00446         for(jpix=0; jpix<nx; jpix++){
00447             mx=mx0;
00448             SPLIT(dplocy0,dplocy,nplocy);
00449             dplocy1=1.-dplocy;
00450             if(nplocy<niny-1){
00451             phiin_1=phiin[nplocy];
00452             phiin_2=phiin[nplocy+1];
00453             }else if(nplocy==niny-1){
00454             phiin_1=phiin[nplocy];
00455             phiin_2=phiin[0];
00456             }else{
00457             phiin_1=phiin[nplocy-niny];
00458             phiin_2=phiin[nplocy+1-niny];
00459             }
00460             double *phiout2=phiout[jpix];
00461             for(ipix=0; ipix<nx; ipix++){
00462             nplocx=nplocxs[ipix];
00463             nplocx2=nplocxs2[ipix];
00464             dplocx=dplocxs[ipix];
00465             phiout2[ipix]+=alpha*
00466                 (+(phiin_1[nplocx]
00467                    +(phiin_1[nplocx2]-phiin_1[nplocx])*dplocx)
00468                  *dplocy1
00469                  +(phiin_2[nplocx]
00470                    +(phiin_2[nplocx2]-phiin_2[nplocx])*dplocx)
00471                  *dplocy);
00472             
00473             }
00474             dplocy0+=ratio;
00475         }
00476         }/*wrap*/
00477     }/*end isa*/
00478     }

void prop_grid_stat ( const MAP_T *  mapin,
const LOCSTAT_T *  ostat,
double *  phiout0,
double  alpha,
double  displacex,
double  displacey,
double  scale,
int  wrap,
long  colstart,
long  colend,
int  optim 
)

Propagate OPD defines on grid mapin to locstat_t that stores the starting point of each column.

alpha is the scaling of data. displacex, displacy is the displacement of the center of the beam on the input grid. scale is the cone effect. 

00489                                                   {
00490     
00491     double *phiout;
00492     double dplocx, dplocy;
00493     int nplocx, nplocy;
00494     int icol,irow;
00495     long offset;
00496     int collen;
00497     int missing=0;
00498     if(colend==0) colend = ostat->ncol;
00499 
00500     const int wrapx1 = mapin->nx;
00501     const int wrapy1 = mapin->ny;
00502     const int wrapx  = wrapx1 - 1;
00503     const int wrapy  = wrapy1 - 1;
00504     
00505     const double dx_in1 = 1./mapin->dx;
00506     const double dx_in2 = scale*dx_in1;
00507     const double dxout  = ostat->dx;
00508     displacex = (displacex-mapin->ox)*dx_in1;
00509     displacey = (displacey-mapin->oy)*dx_in1;
00510     const double *phiin  = mapin->p;
00511     const double ratio  = dxout*dx_in2;
00512     if(optim){
00513     if(fabs(ratio-1)<EPS){
00514         /*grid size of loc_in and loc_out agree*/
00515         double bl, br, tl, tr;
00516         const double *phicol, *phicol2;
00517         int rowdiv,rowdiv2;
00518         int irows;
00519         /*loc_out and loc_in has the same grid sampling.*/
00520         for(icol=colstart; icol<colend; icol++){
00521         /*starting address of that col*/
00522         offset=ostat->cols[icol].pos;
00523         collen=ostat->cols[icol+1].pos-offset;/*exclusive*/
00524 
00525         phiout=phiout0+offset;
00526         dplocy=ostat->cols[icol].ystart*dx_in2+displacey;
00527         if(wrap){
00528             dplocy=dplocy-floor(dplocy/(double)wrapy1)*wrapy1;
00529         }
00530         SPLIT(dplocy,dplocy,nplocy);
00531         dplocx=ostat->cols[icol].xstart*dx_in2+displacex;
00532         if(wrap){
00533             dplocx-=wrapx1*floor(dplocx/(double)wrapx1);
00534             irows=0;
00535         }else{
00536             if(dplocx<0)
00537             irows=iceil(-dplocx);
00538             else
00539             irows=0;
00540         }
00541         SPLIT(dplocx,dplocx,nplocx);
00542 
00543         if(wrap){
00544             phicol  = phiin+nplocy*wrapx1+nplocx;
00545             phicol2 = phiin+(nplocy==wrapy?0:nplocy+1)*wrapx1+nplocx;
00546         }else{
00547             if(nplocy<wrapy && nplocy>=0){
00548             phicol=phiin+nplocy*wrapx1+nplocx;
00549             phicol2=phiin+(nplocy+1)*wrapx1+nplocx;
00550             }else{
00551             missing+=collen;
00552             continue;
00553             }
00554         }
00555  
00556         
00557         bl=dplocx*dplocy;
00558         br=(1.-dplocx)*dplocy;
00559         tl=dplocx*(1-dplocy);
00560         tr=(1.-dplocx)*(1-dplocy);
00561         
00562         rowdiv=wrapx-nplocx;
00563         /*max number of rows possible before wraping*/
00564         if(rowdiv>collen) rowdiv=collen;
00565         if(rowdiv<0)rowdiv=0;
00566         /*reduce to number of needed*/
00567 
00568         for(irow=irows; irow<rowdiv; irow++){
00569             phiout[irow]+=alpha*
00570             (bl*phicol2[irow+1]
00571              +br*phicol2[irow]
00572              +tl*phicol[irow+1]
00573              +tr*phicol[irow]);
00574         }
00575 
00576         if(wrap){
00577             while(rowdiv < collen){/*can wrap several times*/ 
00578             irow=rowdiv;
00579             phiout[irow]+=alpha*
00580                 (bl*phicol2[irow-wrapx]
00581                  +br*phicol2[irow]
00582                  +tl*phicol[irow-wrapx]
00583                  +tr*phicol[irow]);
00584             rowdiv++;
00585             
00586             rowdiv2=rowdiv+wrapx;
00587             if(rowdiv2>collen) rowdiv2=collen;
00588 
00589             phicol-=wrapx1;/*wrap the second part*/
00590             phicol2-=wrapx1;
00591 
00592             for(irow=rowdiv; irow<rowdiv2; irow++){
00593                 phiout[irow]+=alpha*
00594                 (+bl*phicol2[irow+1]
00595                  +br*phicol2[irow]
00596                  +tl*phicol[irow+1]
00597                  +tr*phicol[irow]);
00598             }
00599             rowdiv=rowdiv2;
00600             }
00601         }
00602         }/*end for icol*/
00603     }else{
00604         /*grid size of loc_in and loc_out doesn't agree*/
00605         const double *phicol, *phicol2;
00606         double dplocx0;
00607         int nplocx0;
00608         int rowdiv,rowdiv2;
00609         int irows;
00610         for(icol=colstart; icol<colend; icol++){
00611         /*starting address of that col*/
00612         offset=ostat->cols[icol].pos;
00613         collen=ostat->cols[icol+1].pos-offset;/*exclusive*/
00614 
00615         phiout=phiout0+offset;
00616         dplocy=ostat->cols[icol].ystart*dx_in2+displacey;
00617         if(wrap){
00618             dplocy=dplocy-floor(dplocy/(double)wrapy1)*wrapy1;
00619         }
00620         SPLIT(dplocy,dplocy,nplocy);
00621         const double dplocy1=1.-dplocy;
00622         dplocx=ostat->cols[icol].xstart*dx_in2+displacex;
00623         if(wrap){
00624             dplocx-=wrapx1*floor(dplocx/(double)wrapx1);
00625             irows=0;
00626         }else{
00627             if(dplocx<0){
00628             irows=iceil(-dplocx/ratio);
00629             }else
00630             irows=0;
00631         }
00632 
00633         if(wrap){
00634             phicol  = phiin+nplocy*wrapx1;
00635             phicol2 = phiin+(nplocy==wrapy?0:(nplocy+1))*wrapx1;
00636         }else{
00637             if(nplocy<wrapy && nplocy>=0){
00638             phicol=phiin+nplocy*wrapx1;
00639             phicol2=phiin+(nplocy+1)*wrapx1;
00640             }else{
00641             missing+=collen;
00642             continue;
00643             }
00644         }
00645       
00646         /*last row to do if not wrap*/
00647         /*figure out which row we can go in this segment. */
00648           
00649         rowdiv = iceil((wrapx-dplocx)/ratio);
00650         if(rowdiv<0) rowdiv=0;//rowdiv may be -1 if dplocx=wrapx+0.*
00651         if(rowdiv>collen) rowdiv=collen;
00652         dplocx = dplocx + ratio*irows;
00653         for(irow=irows; irow<rowdiv; irow++){/*no wrap*/
00654             SPLIT(dplocx,dplocx0,nplocx0);
00655             phiout[irow]+=alpha*
00656             (+dplocy1*((1-dplocx0)*phicol[nplocx0]
00657                    +dplocx0*phicol[nplocx0+1])
00658              +dplocy *((1-dplocx0)*phicol2[nplocx0]
00659                    +dplocx0*phicol2[nplocx0+1]));
00660             dplocx+=ratio;
00661         }
00662         if(wrap){
00663             while(rowdiv < collen){/*can wrap several times*/ 
00664             //falls on the edge.
00665             while(dplocx<wrapx1 && rowdiv<collen){
00666                 SPLIT(dplocx,dplocx0,nplocx0);
00667                 phiout[rowdiv]+=alpha*
00668                 (+dplocy1*((1-dplocx0)*phicol[nplocx0]
00669                        +dplocx0*phicol[nplocx0-wrapx])
00670                  +dplocy *((1-dplocx0)*phicol2[nplocx0]
00671                        +dplocx0*phicol2[nplocx0-wrapx]));
00672                 dplocx+=ratio;
00673                 rowdiv++;
00674             }
00675             dplocx=dplocx-wrapx1;           
00676             rowdiv2=iceil((wrapx-dplocx)/ratio);
00677             if(rowdiv2>collen) rowdiv2=collen;
00678             for(irow=rowdiv; irow<rowdiv2; irow++){
00679                 SPLIT(dplocx,dplocx0,nplocx0);
00680                 phiout[irow]+=alpha*
00681                 (+dplocy1*((1-dplocx0)*phicol[nplocx0]
00682                        +dplocx0*phicol[nplocx0+1])
00683                  +dplocy *((1-dplocx0)*phicol2[nplocx0]
00684                        +dplocx0*phicol2[nplocx0+1]));
00685                 dplocx+=ratio;
00686             }
00687             rowdiv=rowdiv2;
00688             }
00689         }
00690         }/*end for icol*/
00691     }/*fabs(dx_in2*dxout-1)<EPS*/
00692     }else{
00693     double dplocx0;
00694     int nplocy1, nplocx1;
00695 
00696     /*non optimized case. slower, but hopefully accurate*/
00697     for(icol=colstart; icol<colend; icol++){
00698         offset=ostat->cols[icol].pos;
00699         collen=ostat->cols[icol+1].pos-offset;
00700         phiout=phiout0+offset;
00701         dplocy=ostat->cols[icol].ystart*dx_in2+displacey;
00702         SPLIT(dplocy,dplocy,nplocy);
00703         const double dplocy1=1.-dplocy;
00704         if(nplocy<0||nplocy>=wrapy){
00705         if(wrap){
00706             while(nplocy<0)
00707             nplocy+=wrapy1;
00708             while(nplocy>wrapy)
00709             nplocy-=wrapy1;
00710             nplocy1=(nplocy==wrapx?0:nplocy+1);
00711         }else{
00712             missing+=collen;
00713             continue;
00714         }
00715         }else{
00716         nplocy1=nplocy+1;
00717         }
00718         dplocx0=(ostat->cols[icol].xstart)*dx_in2+displacex;
00719         for(irow=0; irow<collen; irow++){
00720         SPLIT(dplocx0,dplocx,nplocx);
00721         dplocx0+=ratio;
00722         if(nplocx>=0 && nplocx<wrapx){
00723             nplocx1=nplocx+1;
00724         }else{
00725             if(wrap){
00726             while(nplocx<0)
00727                 nplocx+=wrapx1;
00728             while(nplocx>wrapx)
00729                 nplocx-=wrapx1;
00730             nplocx1=(nplocx==wrapx?0:nplocx+1);
00731             }else{
00732             missing++;
00733             continue;
00734             }
00735         }
00736         
00737         phiout[irow]+= alpha*
00738             (dplocx * (dplocy * phiin[(nplocx1) + (nplocy1)*wrapx1]
00739                    +dplocy1 * phiin[(nplocx1) + nplocy*wrapx1])
00740              + (1-dplocx) * (dplocy * phiin[nplocx + (nplocy1)*wrapx1]
00741                      +dplocy1 * phiin[nplocx + nplocy*wrapx1]));
00742         
00743         }/*for irow*/
00744     }/*for icol*/
00745     }/*if not optim*/
00746     if(missing>0){
00747     warning("%d points not covered by input screen\n", missing);
00748     }
00749 }/*function*/

void prop_grid ( const MAP_T *  mapin,
const LOC_T *  locout,
double *  phiout,
double  alpha,
double  displacex,
double  displacey,
double  scale,
int  wrap,
long  start,
long  end 
)

Propagate OPD defines on grid mapin to coordinate locout.

alpha is the scaling of data. displacex, displacy is the displacement of the center of the beam on the input grid. scale is the cone effect. 

00758                                 {
00759     double dplocx, dplocy;
00760     int nplocx, nplocy, nplocx1, nplocy1;
00761     int iloc;
00762     int missing=0;
00763     if(!locout) error("locout is NULL!");
00764     if(end==0){
00765     end=locout->nloc;
00766     }
00767     const int wrapx1 = mapin->nx;
00768     const int wrapy1 = mapin->ny;
00769     const int wrapx=wrapx1-1;
00770     const int wrapy=wrapy1-1;
00771     const double dx_in1 = 1./mapin->dx;
00772     const double dx_in2 = scale*dx_in1;
00773     displacex = (displacex-mapin->ox)*dx_in1;
00774     displacey = (displacey-mapin->oy)*dx_in1;
00775     const double *px=locout->locx;
00776     const double *py=locout->locy;
00777 
00778     
00779     double (*phiin)[wrapx1]=(double(*)[wrapx1])(mapin->p);
00780     for(iloc=start; iloc<end; iloc++){
00781     dplocy=myfma(py[iloc],dx_in2,displacey);
00782     dplocx=myfma(px[iloc],dx_in2,displacex);
00783     SPLIT(dplocx,dplocx,nplocx);
00784     SPLIT(dplocy,dplocy,nplocy);
00785     if(nplocx<0||nplocx>=wrapx||nplocy<0||nplocy>=wrapy){
00786         if(wrap){
00787         while(nplocx<0)
00788             nplocx+=wrapx1;
00789         while(nplocx>wrapx)
00790             nplocx-=wrapx1;
00791         while(nplocy<0)
00792             nplocy+=wrapy1;
00793         while(nplocy>wrapy)
00794             nplocy-=wrapy1;
00795         
00796         nplocx1=(nplocx==wrapx?0:nplocx+1);
00797         nplocy1=(nplocy==wrapy?0:nplocy+1);
00798         }else{
00799         missing++;
00800         continue;
00801         }
00802     }else{
00803         nplocx1=nplocx+1;
00804         nplocy1=nplocy+1;
00805     }
00806     phiout[iloc]+=alpha*
00807         (+(phiin[nplocy][nplocx]*(1.-dplocx)
00808            +phiin[nplocy][nplocx1]*dplocx)*(1.-dplocy)
00809          +(phiin[nplocy1][nplocx]*(1.-dplocx)
00810            +phiin[nplocy1][nplocx1]*dplocx)*dplocy);
00811     }
00812     if(missing>0){
00813     warning("%d points not covered by input screen\n", missing);
00814     }
00815 }

void prop_nongrid ( LOC_T *  locin,
const double *  phiin,
const LOC_T *  locout,
const double *  ampout,
double *  phiout,
double  alpha,
double  displacex,
double  displacey,
double  scale,
long  start,
long  end 
)

Propagate OPD defines on coordinate locin to coordinate locout.

This is the slowest. alpha is the scaling of data. displacex, displacy is the displacement of the center of the beam on the input grid. scale is the cone effect. 

00825                                              {
00826     loc_create_map_npad(locin,1);
00827     double dplocx, dplocy;
00828     int nplocx, nplocy, nplocx1, nplocy1;
00829     long iloc;
00830     int missing=0;
00831  
00832     const int wrapx1 = locin->map->nx;
00833     const int wrapy1 = locin->map->ny;
00834     const int wrapx = wrapx1-1;
00835     const int wrapy = wrapy1-1;
00836     const double dx_in1 = 1./locin->dx;
00837     const double dx_in2 = scale*dx_in1;
00838     displacex = (displacex-locin->map->ox)*dx_in1;
00839     displacey = (displacey-locin->map->oy)*dx_in1;
00840     const double *px=locout->locx;
00841     const double *py=locout->locy;
00842 
00843 #if ONLY_FULL==1
00844     long iphi1,iphi2,iphi3,iphi4;
00845 #else
00846     long iphi;
00847 #endif
00848     long (*map)[locin->map->nx]
00849     =(long(*)[locin->map->nx])(locin->map->p);
00850     //-1 because we count from 1 in the map.
00851     const double *phiin0=phiin-1;
00852     if(!end) end=locout->nloc;
00853     for(iloc=start; iloc<end; iloc++){
00854     if(ampout && fabs(ampout[iloc])<EPS)
00855         continue;//skip points that has zero amplitude
00856     dplocy=myfma(py[iloc],dx_in2,displacey);
00857     dplocx=myfma(px[iloc],dx_in2,displacex);
00858 
00859     SPLIT(dplocx,dplocx,nplocx);
00860     SPLIT(dplocy,dplocy,nplocy);
00861     if(nplocx<0||nplocx>=wrapx||nplocy<0||nplocy>=wrapy){
00862         missing++;
00863         continue;
00864     }else{
00865         nplocx1=nplocx+1;
00866         nplocy1=nplocy+1;
00867     }
00868 
00869 #if ONLY_FULL == 1 //only proceed if all four points exist.
00870     iphi1=map[nplocy][nplocx];
00871     iphi2=map[nplocy][nplocx1];
00872     iphi3=map[nplocy1][nplocx];
00873     iphi4=map[nplocy1][nplocx1];
00874     if(iphi1 && iphi2 && iphi3 && iphi4){
00875         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi1]*(1.-dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
00876         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi2]*(dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
00877         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi3]*(1.-dplocx)*(dplocy));
00878         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi4]*(dplocx)*(dplocy));
00879     }else{
00880         missing++;
00881     }
00882 #else   
00883     if((iphi=map[nplocy][nplocx]))
00884         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi]*(1.-dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
00885     if((iphi=map[nplocy][nplocx1]))
00886         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi]*(dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
00887     if((iphi=map[nplocy1][nplocx]))
00888         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi]*(1.-dplocx)*(dplocy));
00889     if((iphi=map[nplocy1][nplocx1]))
00890         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi]*(dplocx)*(dplocy));
00891 #endif
00892     }
00893     if(missing>0){
00894     warning("%d points not covered by input screen\n", missing);
00895     }
00896 }

void prop_nongrid_map ( LOC_T *  locin,
const double *  phiin,
MAP_T *  mapout,
double  alpha,
double  displacex,
double  displacey,
double  scale,
long  start,
long  end,
long  step 
)

Propagate OPD defines on coordinate locin to grid mapout.

alpha is the scaling of data. displacex, displacy is the displacement of the center of the beam on the input grid. scale is the cone effect. 

00904                                                             {
00905     //propagate to a square map.
00906     loc_create_map_npad(locin,2);//will only do once and save in locin.
00907 
00908     double dplocx, dplocy;
00909     int nplocx, nplocy, nplocx1, nplocy1;
00910     long iloc;
00911 
00912     const int wrapx1 = locin->map->nx;
00913     const int wrapy1 = locin->map->ny;
00914     const int wrapx = wrapx1-1;
00915     const int wrapy = wrapy1-1;
00916     const double dx_in1 = 1./locin->dx;
00917     const double dx_in2 = scale*dx_in1;
00918     displacex = (displacex-locin->map->ox)*dx_in1;
00919     displacey = (displacey-locin->map->oy)*dx_in1;
00920     const double dxout=mapout->dx;
00921     const double ox=mapout->ox;
00922     const double oy=mapout->oy;
00923     double *phiout=mapout->p;
00924 #if ONLY_FULL==1
00925     long iphi1,iphi2,iphi3,iphi4;
00926 #else
00927     long iphi;
00928 #endif
00929     //-1 because we count from 1 in the map.
00930     long (*map)[locin->map->nx]=(long(*)[locin->map->nx])(locin->map->p);
00931     const int nxout=mapout->nx;
00932     const double *phiin0=phiin-1;
00933     if(!end) end=mapout->ny;
00934     if(!step) step=1;
00935     for(int iy=start; iy<end; iy+=step){
00936     dplocy=myfma(oy+iy*dxout,dx_in2,displacey);
00937     SPLIT(dplocy,dplocy,nplocy);
00938     if(nplocy<0||nplocy>=wrapy){
00939         continue;
00940     }else{
00941         nplocy1=nplocy+1;
00942     }
00943     for(int ix=0; ix<nxout; ix++){
00944         iloc=ix+iy*nxout;
00945         dplocx=myfma(ox+ix*dxout,dx_in2,displacex); 
00946         SPLIT(dplocx,dplocx,nplocx);
00947         if(nplocx<0||nplocx>=wrapx){
00948         continue;
00949         }else{
00950         nplocx1=nplocx+1;
00951         }
00952 
00953 #if ONLY_FULL == 1 //only proceed if all four points exist.
00954         iphi1=map[nplocy][nplocx];
00955         iphi2=map[nplocy][nplocx1];
00956         iphi3=map[nplocy1][nplocx];
00957         iphi4=map[nplocy1][nplocx1];
00958         if(iphi1 && iphi2 && iphi3 && iphi4){
00959         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi1]*(1.-dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
00960         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi2]*(dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
00961         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi3]*(1.-dplocx)*(dplocy));
00962         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi4]*(dplocx)*(dplocy));
00963         }
00964 #else   
00965         if((iphi=map[nplocy][nplocx])) 
00966         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi]*(1.-dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
00967         if((iphi=map[nplocy][nplocx1]))
00968         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi]*(dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
00969         if((iphi=map[nplocy1][nplocx]))
00970         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi]*(1.-dplocx)*(dplocy));
00971         if((iphi=map[nplocy1][nplocx1]))
00972         phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi]*(dplocx)*(dplocy));
00973 #endif
00974     }
00975     }
00976 }

void prop_nongrid_pts ( LOC_T *  locin,
const double *  phiin,
const PTS_T *  pts,
const double *  ampout,
double *  phiout,
double  alpha,
double  displacex,
double  displacey,
double  scale,
long  start,
long  end,
long  step 
)

Propagate OPD defines on coordinate locin to subapertures pts.

alpha is the scaling of data. displacex, displacy is the displacement of the center of the beam on the input grid. scale is the cone effect. 

00985                                                             {
00986     //propagate to a square map.
00987     loc_create_map_npad(locin,1);//will only do once and save in locin.
00988 
00989     double dplocx, dplocy;
00990     int nplocx, nplocy, nplocx1, nplocy1;
00991 
00992     const int wrapx1 = locin->map->nx;
00993     const int wrapy1 = locin->map->ny;
00994     const int wrapx = wrapx1-1;
00995     const int wrapy = wrapy1-1;
00996     const double dx_in1 = 1./locin->dx;
00997     const double dx_in2 = scale*dx_in1;
00998     displacex = (displacex-locin->map->ox)*dx_in1;
00999     displacey = (displacey-locin->map->oy)*dx_in1;
01000     const double dxout=pts->dx;
01001 #if ONLY_FULL==1
01002     long iphi1,iphi2,iphi3,iphi4;
01003 #else
01004     long iphi;
01005 #endif
01006     //-1 because we count from 1 in the map.
01007     long (*map)[locin->map->nx]
01008     =(long(*)[locin->map->nx])(locin->map->p);
01009     const double *phiin0=phiin-1;
01010     long iloc=-1;
01011     if(!end) end=pts->nsa;
01012     if(!step) step=1;
01013     for(int isa=start; isa<end; isa+=step){
01014     const double ox=pts->origx[isa];
01015     const double oy=pts->origy[isa];
01016     for(int iy=0; iy<pts->nx; iy++){
01017         dplocy=myfma(oy+iy*dxout,dx_in2,displacey);
01018         SPLIT(dplocy,dplocy,nplocy);
01019         if(nplocy<0||nplocy>=wrapy){
01020         continue;
01021         }else{
01022         nplocy1=nplocy+1;
01023         }
01024         for(int ix=0; ix<pts->nx; ix++){
01025         iloc++;
01026         if(ampout && fabs(ampout[iloc])<EPS)
01027             continue;//skip points that has zero amplitude
01028         dplocx=myfma(ox+ix*dxout,dx_in2,displacex); 
01029         SPLIT(dplocx,dplocx,nplocx);
01030         if(nplocx<0||nplocx>=wrapx){
01031             continue;
01032         }else{
01033             nplocx1=nplocx+1;
01034         }
01035 
01036 #if ONLY_FULL == 1 //only proceed if all four points exist.
01037         iphi1=map[nplocy][nplocx];
01038         iphi2=map[nplocy][nplocx1];
01039         iphi3=map[nplocy1][nplocx];
01040         iphi4=map[nplocy1][nplocx1];
01041         if(iphi1 && iphi2 && iphi3 && iphi4){
01042             phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi1]*(1.-dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
01043             phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi2]*(dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
01044             phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi3]*(1.-dplocx)*(dplocy));
01045             phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi4]*(dplocx)*(dplocy));
01046         }
01047 #else   
01048         if((iphi=map[nplocy][nplocx]))
01049             phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi]*(1.-dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
01050         if((iphi=map[nplocy][nplocx1]))
01051             phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi]*(dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
01052         if((iphi=map[nplocy1][nplocx]))
01053             phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi]*(1.-dplocx)*(dplocy));
01054         if((iphi=map[nplocy1][nplocx1]))
01055             phiout[iloc]+=alpha*(phiin0[iphi]*(dplocx)*(dplocy));
01056 #endif
01057         }    
01058     }
01059     }
01060 }

void prop_nongrid_cubic ( LOC_T *  locin,
const double *  phiin,
const LOC_T *  locout,
const double *  ampout,
double *  phiout,
double  alpha,
double  displacex,
double  displacey,
double  scale,
double  cubic_iac,
long  start,
long  end 
)

like prop_nongrid but with cubic influence functions. 

01077                                  {
01078     loc_create_map_npad(locin,2);//padding to avoid test boundary
01079     double dplocx, dplocy;
01080     int nplocx, nplocy;
01081     int ix,iy;
01082     long iloc;
01083     const double dx_in1 = 1./locin->dx;
01084     const double dx_in2 = scale*dx_in1;
01085     displacex = (displacex-locin->map->ox)*dx_in1;
01086     displacey = (displacey-locin->map->oy)*dx_in1;
01087     const double *px=locout->locx;
01088     const double *py=locout->locy;
01089 
01090     //-1 because we count from 1 in the map.
01091     long (*map)[locin->map->nx]
01092     =(long(*)[locin->map->nx])(locin->map->p);
01093     const double *phiin0=phiin-1;
01094     //cubic
01095     MAKE_CUBIC_PARAM;
01096     double dplocx0, dplocy0;
01097     const int nmapx3=locin->map->nx-3;
01098     const int nmapy3=locin->map->ny-3;
01099     if(!end) end=locout->nloc;
01100     for(iloc=start; iloc<end; iloc++){
01101     if(ampout && fabs(ampout[iloc])<EPS)
01102         continue;//skip points that has zero amplitude
01103     dplocy=myfma(py[iloc],dx_in2,displacey);
01104     dplocx=myfma(px[iloc],dx_in2,displacex);
01105 
01106     SPLIT(dplocx,dplocx,nplocx);
01107     SPLIT(dplocy,dplocy,nplocy);
01108     if(nplocy<1 || nplocy>nmapy3 || nplocx<1 || nplocx>nmapx3){
01109         continue;
01110     }
01111     dplocy0=1.-dplocy;
01112     dplocx0=1.-dplocx;
01113         
01114     fx[0]=dplocx0*dplocx0*(c3+c4*dplocx0);
01115     fx[1]=c0+dplocx*dplocx*(c1+c2*dplocx);
01116     fx[2]=c0+dplocx0*dplocx0*(c1+c2*dplocx0);
01117     fx[3]=dplocx*dplocx*(c3+c4*dplocx);
01118         
01119     fy[0]=dplocy0*dplocy0*(c3+c4*dplocy0);
01120     fy[1]=c0+dplocy*dplocy*(c1+c2*dplocy);
01121     fy[2]=c0+dplocy0*dplocy0*(c1+c2*dplocy0);
01122     fy[3]=dplocy*dplocy*(c3+c4*dplocy);
01123 
01124     for(iy=nplocy-1; iy<nplocy+3; iy++){
01125         for(ix=nplocx-1; ix<nplocx+3; ix++){
01126         long iphi=map[iy][ix];
01127         if(iphi){
01128             phiout[iloc]+=alpha*fx[ix-nplocx+1]
01129             *fy[iy-nplocy+1]*phiin0[iphi];
01130         }
01131         }
01132     }
01133     }
01134 }

void prop_nongrid_reverse ( LOC_T *  locin,
double *  phiin,
const LOC_T *  locout,
const double *  ampout,
const double *  phiout,
double  alpha,
double  displacex,
double  displacey,
double  scale 
)

the following routine is used to do down sampling by doing *reverse* ray tracing.

locin is coarse sampling, locout is fine sampling. phiin is the unknown 

01290                            {
01291     if(locin->dx<locout->dx) {
01292     error("This routine is designed for down sampling.\n");
01293     }
01294     loc_create_map_npad(locin,1);//will only do once and save in locin.
01295     double dplocx, dplocy;
01296     int nplocx, nplocy, nplocx1, nplocy1;
01297     long iloc;
01298     int missing=0;
01299     const int wrapx1 = locin->map->nx;
01300     const int wrapy1 = locin->map->ny;
01301     const int wrapx = wrapx1-1;
01302     const int wrapy = wrapy1-1;
01303     const double dx_in1 = 1./locin->dx;
01304     const double dx_in2 = scale*dx_in1;
01305     displacex = (displacex-locin->map->ox)*dx_in1;
01306     displacey = (displacey-locin->map->oy)*dx_in1;
01307     const double *px=locout->locx;
01308     const double *py=locout->locy;
01309 
01310 #if ONLY_FULL==1
01311     long iphi1,iphi2,iphi3,iphi4;
01312 #else
01313     long iphi;
01314 #endif
01315     long (*map)[locin->map->nx]
01316     =(long(*)[locin->map->nx])(locin->map->p);
01317     //-1 because we count from 1 in the map.
01318     double *phiin0=phiin-1;
01319     for(iloc=0; iloc<locout->nloc; iloc++){
01320     if(ampout && fabs(ampout[iloc])<EPS)
01321         continue;//skip points that has zero amplitude
01322     dplocy=myfma(py[iloc],dx_in2,displacey);
01323     dplocx=myfma(px[iloc],dx_in2,displacex);
01324 
01325     SPLIT(dplocx,dplocx,nplocx);
01326     SPLIT(dplocy,dplocy,nplocy);
01327     if(nplocx<0||nplocx>=wrapx||nplocy<0||nplocy>=wrapy){
01328         missing++;
01329         continue;
01330     }else{
01331         nplocx1=nplocx+1;
01332         nplocy1=nplocy+1;
01333     }
01334 
01335 #if ONLY_FULL == 1 //only proceed if all four points exist.
01336     iphi1=map[nplocy][nplocx];
01337     iphi2=map[nplocy][nplocx1];
01338     iphi3=map[nplocy1][nplocx];
01339     iphi4=map[nplocy1][nplocx1];
01340     if(iphi1 && iphi2 && iphi3 && iphi4){
01341         phiin0[iphi1]+=alpha*(phiout[iloc]*(1.-dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
01342         phiin0[iphi2]+=alpha*(phiout[iloc]*(dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
01343         phiin0[iphi3]+=alpha*(phiout[iloc]*(1.-dplocx)*(dplocy));
01344         phiin0[iphi4]+=alpha*(phiout[iloc]*(dplocx)*(dplocy));
01345     }else{
01346         //if(!ampout || fabs(ampout[iloc])>EPS)
01347         missing++;
01348     }
01349 #else   
01350     if((iphi=map[nplocy][nplocx])) 
01351         phiin0[iphi]+=alpha*(phiout[iloc]*(1.-dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
01352     if((iphi=map[nplocy][nplocx1]))
01353         phiin0[iphi]+=alpha*(phiout[iloc]*(dplocx)*(1.-dplocy));
01354     if((iphi=map[nplocy1][nplocx]))
01355         phiin0[iphi]+=alpha*(phiout[iloc]*(1.-dplocx)*(dplocy));
01356     if((iphi=map[nplocy1][nplocx1]))
01357         phiin0[iphi]+=alpha*(phiout[iloc]*(dplocx)*(dplocy));
01358 #endif
01359     }
01360     if(missing>0){
01361     warning("%d points not covered by input screen\n", missing);
01362     }
01363 }
